doc:
Paul McGrath (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_McGrath_(actor) 0 Benjamin Franklin McGrath (February 2, 1903 – May 13, 1967) was an American television and film actor and stunt performer who played the comical, optimistic cook with the white beard, Charlie B. Wooster, on the western series Wagon Train for five seasons on NBC and then three seasons on ABC. McGrath appeared in all 272 episodes in the eight seasons of the series, which had ended its run only two years before his death. McGrath's Wooster character hence provided the meals and companionship for both fictional trail masters, Ward Bond as Seth Adams and John McIntire as Christopher "Chris" Hale. Benjamin_Franklin_McGrath ( February_2_,_1903 – May_13_,_1967 ) was an_American_television_and_film_actor_and_stunt_performer who played the_comical_,_optimistic_cook with the_white_beard , Charlie_B._Wooster , on the_western_series_Wagon_Train for five_seasons on NBC and then three_seasons on ABC . McGrath appeared in all_272_episodes in the_eight_seasons of the_series , which had_ended its_run_only_two_years before his_death . McGrath 's_Wooster_character hence provided the_meals_and_companionship for both_fictional_trail_masters , Ward_Bond as Seth_Adams and John_McIntire as Christopher_"_Chris_"_Hale .
